Featured Project

Cineprime

MERN stack project with JWT authentication. Complete functionality available for registered users that may explore and plan when to watch desired titles while keeping track of watched movies.
  • JS
  • React
  • JWT Auth
  • MongoDB
  • Axios

Featured Project

Mixed Drinks Library

Webapp providing cocktail search by pivotal spirit. Pick your spirit and below it generates list of drinks. After chosing one of the drinks, it re-routes user to see details and preparation methods.
  • JS
  • HTML/CSS
  • React
  • React Router

Featured Project

Hops Revolution

Reversed Geolocation in combination with Google Maps implementation. Search brewery by the name or it's location and find it on the map with further information.
  • JS
  • React
  • Google Maps
  • Geolocation

Featured Project

TUNR

Project is built with Ruby on Rails on the back end and React on the frontend. Offers CRUD functionality. Hosted on Heroku and Netlify with the continuous intergration.
  • JS
  • React
  • Ruby on Rails
  • PSQL
